entry.title: Community Market Village Rules!
entry.text: - Must be Level 20 to claim spot this should help those day 1 peeps claiming good spots never to return. - NO Heat Generating work stations camp fire and a Workbench are fine. - NO Skyscrapers no need for silly mega bases. - You may only have 1 of the Market spots - NO TREE FARMS a couple for decoration is fine. - NO SNOW TREES Ragnar has an issue when snow trees are anywhere but Snow Biome ðŸ˜† - Digging digging down is fine, just stay within your LCB, no digging under the roads. - Vending Machines no limit on your Market spot. - Getting started once you reach 20, pick a spot, and call an admin, we will remove the current LCB and you must place yours in the exact spot. - If having your own Market is not for you, we have a few spots available at the main building, you can have 1 or the other, not both.
